block.p: HARPER-Harold. The Board of Directors, Administration, Medical Board, and staff of Peninsula Hospital Center are saddened by the passing of Harold Harper. A devoted employee of over 25 years, Harold touched us and our patients in a very special way. Sincere condolences are extended to the Harper family. Joel A. Miele Sr., P.E., Chairman, Board of Directors Robert V. Levine, President & Chief Exec Officer Peter A. Galvin, MD, President, Medical Board

HARPER-Harold. The Board of Directors, Administration, Medical Board, and staff of Peninsula Hospital Center are saddened by the passing of Harold Harper. A devoted employee of over 25 years, Harold touched us and our patients in a very special way. Sincere condolences are extended to the Harper family. Joel A.
